name: A Devil In Heaven
description:
A devil has been spotted running around Heaven causing havoc!

You and your angel friends need to catch him and put him back in his place!

This is a local multiplayer game (2-4 players) where angel characters need to catch the devil character as quickly as possible

Scores are calculated by the amount of time the devil is alive

Controls: (controller only)

  • Left Stick -> Move
  • A / B Buttons -> Jump
  • Right Bumper -> Dash

Note: There is a known bug if you start up the game with multiple controllers connected to your computer.  To prevent this from happening, start up the game and then connect your controllers.

Music: www.bensound.com
